title: Youtube starts to buffer after approximately 30 minutes of watching a streaml
content: I am experiencing contant buffer after 30 mimutes of watching a stream on firefox, it keeps happening and i have to move to edge to carry on watching it. It is not my internet as other browsers have no issues i moved to firefox due to chromes ram hungry nature and left opera due to it taking massive storage space. I dont want to have to move again but its becoming a great annoyance, I was thinking is this due to firefox not being chromium based so youtube does not like it? I cleared the startup cache and this hasn't fixed i hope you can sort this if not i will have to move browser.

title: A bug on Firefox100(Firefox Nightly)_when the user downloads a pdf file, it is opened in the same opened tab
content:
Environment: Firefox Nightly

Description: When the user clicks on the icon of add score for the second time without refreshing, the dropdown of tests does not appear.

Steps: 1- Login to "https://www.ilovepdf.com/jpg_to_pdf" through Firefox Nightly. 2- Click on the Select JPG images button. 3- Add any jpg file. 4- Click on the Convert to PDF button. 5- Click on the download PDF button.

Expected Result: The pdf file is downloaded and when the user clicks on it, it is opened in a new tab (check attached 001).

Actual Result: The pdf file is not downloaded and it opens in the same tab (check attached 002 a &b).

content: Print Dialogue still not resetting to the original System print dialogue after print.tab_modal dialog is set to false. All the fixes say alter the print.tab_modal dialog to false to set the original system print dialogue as the default but it doesn't work when I do that, anyone got any ideas on how to get rid of this horrible new print dialogue. This new print dialogue is rubbish, it doesn't have the features I need and even some of the ones it does have require an extra click compared to the original system print. I need to be able to alter print quality on a page by page frequency. I need to be able to choose page numbers in an instant, not have to choose between odds, evens and custom then define which. I have tried using this "new" default print dialogue and it doesn't even scale correctly but the real time waster is having to click the link to get back to the original system print dialogue. Why would someone override a perfectly good system for one with less features whilst also making the ones it does have more clunky to use.

title: Firefox non mi chiede più il permesso per iniziare un Download
content:
Buongiorno a tutti, da ieri sera Firefox non mi chiede più il permesso per eseguire un download, con la classica schermata che si apriva sempre dove chideva se aprire il file con qualche software oppure eseguire il download. L' unico modo che ho trovato per risolvere il problema è nelle impostazioni selezionare la voce che mi permette di scegliere di volta in volta in qualche cartella salvare il file. Questione scomoda però considerando che spesso devo consultare dei pdf e non vorrei scaricarli ogni volta mentre altre volte ho la necessita di archiviarli normalmente. Qualcuno mi sa indicare come procedere per ritornare alla situazione di Defoult.

Grazie mille in anticipo. Enrico

title: Gmail does not load until cache is cleared
content:
Hi,

Something seems to be happening with my Gmail. After some time, it stops updating. When attempting to reload the page, no requests are even sent from Firefox. When attempting to load it in a new tab, I get an endless loading sign but no indication a request is actually being sent (no request in network tab, no domain in the bottom corners as happens when loading a page).

All other Google products load correctly.

The solutions I've found are to log out of Google and log back in or clear cache/cookies/etc for Google. However, after some time this issue pops up again.

I've already rebooted the machine, done latest update, cleared site cache etc etc etc. and this keeps happening.

title: En el uso de outlook, el correo se archiva, se borra, etc.. pareciendo responsable el navegador, ya que no ocurre con otros
content: Hola muy buenas, Cuando utilizo Outlook vía web, y me dispongo a escribir un correo nuevo o responder, al tocar teclas de letras me guarda los correos, los archiva, los elimina, los pone en alguna carpeta, y todo ello de manera inesperada. Para encontrarlo, debo acceder a borradores y ahí veo dónde los ha puesto. Junto con el servicio informático de la entidad de mi correo, hemos observado que solamente ocurre desde el navegador Firefox, que es el que yo deseo utilizar siempre. No sé si podéis ayudarme. Saludos, Jose

title: what are the configuration requires for autocomplete work correctly.
content:
Hello Team,

I am working on form submit feature in one of project, and for that I set autocomplete='on' at form level, but I am not able see the autocomplete feature when I try submit form second time, I want to see previous input value as a suggestion to user so if he/she wants to use the same session input values if they want to use it.

I set this below kind of code inside my one of form so that it will allow user to show previous input values as a suggestion, this code works correctly and show autocomplete suggestion to user in Chrome and Edge browser but when I try to run the web form in Firefox It is not showing me autocomplete suggestion which entered previously. so could you help me out and provide some suggestion what are the things I missed here?

<input id="name" 

               class="cell"                type="text"                list="autocompleteOff"                autocomplete="name"                />

I tried below things but no luck.

  1. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/control-whether-firefox-automatically-fills-forms
  2. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1321000


Any suggestion or help would be helpful to fix this issue.

Thanks!

title: Shortly after launching Firefox / Minefield music starts playing for few seconds
content:
Whenever FF (Minefield) is launched, a minute or two or so after the launch, a few seconds of music is played. Not a recently introduced issue but happening for a long time ("years").

Reinstalling FF doesn't resolve this for me. Actually I run into this issue on both Wndows 8/10 and MacOS. I tried using a completely fresh install in a virtual box and issue still occurred.

Just for a few seconds - but rather disturbing and humiliating when in office/ public environment and volume is still up from i.e. online meeting or a previous (bad) audio connection.

FWIW: on MacOS is seems to me that the native Music app is being launched in the background which starts playing whatever is at the top of your playlist. Any suggestions from your end to resolve? And/or perhaps any relation with FF account?

Thx!

title: Downloads Setting
content:
Hi!

I am a businessman from Greytown, South Africa and need help with my Firefox Downloads setting.

I have my Downloads set to "Always ask you where to save files." Up until this morning, this brought up a Downloads dialogue that, among other things, gave me the option to either open an attachment or save it to a folder of my choice.

However, as of this morning, this setting no long works. Firefox automatically saves clicked attachments to my Downloads folder. I have checked the Downloads setting and can confirm that it is set correctly to "Always ask you where to save files." I am using Firefox Version 98.0 (64-Bit). Can anyone help? I'd really be grateful as automatic downloads is going to cause me a lot of headaches.

Regards....

title: Firefox cannot open file manager
content:
I am on Arch Linux using i3. I have been using Firefox for a while but recently switched from Nautilus to pcmanfm as my file manager. Now Firefox is unable to save any file or do anything else that requires opening the file manager. Running it through the terminal I get:

"Can't open portal file chooser: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.ServiceUnknown: The name org.freedesktop.portal.Desktop was not provided by any .service files"

I have xdg-desktop-portal installed and have tried xdg-desktop-portal-{gnome, gtk, and kde}. I have also tried setting widget.use-xdg-desktop-portal to both true and false, neither of which changed anything. Reinstalling Nautilus also doesn't fix it. Does anybody know what could be causing this?

title: Lost tabs
content:
I wouldn't be asking for help from a 'volunteer' if I didntt have to. I lost all of my Firefox tabs again (again!) today, in the last half hour. I can't 'restore the previous session'. I'm starting to feel pushed into giving up PC's altogether, with with problem of losing my Firefox session tabs after restarting my PC. Who needs PC devices/smart phones altogether. I'm feeling more and more stupid every time this happens. Why can't mozilla make Firefox robust enough that I can always get my previous session back. This time it happened for a new reason: Firefox had a new window open up when I restarted my PC, with an advertisement for a Disney movie. IF Mozilla is so smart, why can't they fix a problem like this? I see in the Mozilla knowledge base that people ask about this problem frequently.

title: Firefox causing cable modem/router to crash
content: I have read on different sites that other people over the years have had issues with Firefox causing router/modem problems. One case was related to Amazon, another case to Home Depot, but in my case it is caused on the initial start of Firefox after a boot. Once the router/modem is reset, we can restart Firefox multiple times each day and it never causes a problem again. In our case, it is caused by the home page (aolmail.com). I have read all the solutions that I have found and the only thing that appears to work for us is to start Firefox in Troubleshooting Mode. Then we are fine with no further modem/router hang ups. Any suggestions as to what to try to resolve this issue. It's on my Wife's computer and if she ain't happy, no one else is. Thanks.
creator: mike.steele1

title: Most recent update (98.0) affects online banking
content: After Firefox 98.0 was installed on HP laptop Windows 10 today (3/8/2022) I cannot access online banking for Citizens Bank. URL is https://citizensbankonline.com. I can access online user name and password but cannot proceed to security question which is necessary before accounts can be shown. URL worked fine with Firefox 97.0. URL works with Google Chrome. Firefox 98.0 works fine with online banking with other banks I deal with. It's just this one URL I am having problems. After entering the online user name and password and hitting "login" the screen is a white blank and will not proceed further. I called Citizens Bank and my account is not locked.
